title: Shrub Star
summaries: The Shrub Star is a Hardmode, post-Plantera pet-summoning item that spawns an Everscream Sapling to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, the Everscream Sapling flies toward them, tucking its legs together and emitting flames from beneath itself like a rocket. The Shrub Star is dropped by the Everscream during the Frost Moon event with a 5â€“25% chance depending on the current wave.
